name: Laxman Adhikari
bio: Hello, I am Laxman and I am a self-taught  developer with a strong passion for coding and learning. I have been making projects for almost 4 years. I love to explore a new piece of technology. I am always on the lookout for new projects and opportunities to expand my skills, and I am excited about the possibilities that the future holds for me in the world of software development.
